survey_name: Public Health Clinic Patient Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess patient satisfaction with services provided at public health clinics, focusing on appointment scheduling, waiting times, staff interactions, and overall experience to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling your most recent appointment at the clinic?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for balanced measurement. Ensure mobile-responsive layout for accessibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons (SINGLE_CHOICE). Randomize option order to reduce bias.

questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' field with text entry for unlisted options. Mobile users may prefer checkboxes over dropdowns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE). Add conditional text field if 'Other' is selected.

questions.question_text: How long did you wait beyond your scheduled appointment time to be seen by a healthcare provider?

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons (SINGLE_CHOICE). Display options vertically.
